name: Pixel Terminator 3000
description:
Just a little unfinished, now finished game for my game jam!

You play move with the arrow keys and you shoot the evil space-bugs with your mouse pointer, you earn points every second, you'll even gain more points if there are more enemies on the screen, but pay attention to those little things, they kill you in 3 hits!

Shoot more of these evil little things to gain even more points!

Created with Clickteam Fusion 2.5
